modules.name: GitHub.Actions.Cache
modules.comments:
Exports functions from the @actions/cache module provided by GitHub
https://github.com/actions/toolkit/tree/main/packages/cache

declarations.comments:
useAzureSdk: Indicates whether to use the Azure Blob SDK to download caches that are stored on Azure Blob Storage to improve reliability and performance
useAzureSdk default: true
downloadConcurrency: Number of parallel downloads (this option only applies when using the Azure SDK)
downloadConcurrency default: 8
Maximum time for each download request, in milliseconds (this option only applies when using the Azure SDK)
timeoutInMs default: 30000
declarations.title: DownloadOptions

declarations.comments: A default set of Download Options. Override as needed
declarations.title: defaultDownloadOptions

declarations.comments:
paths: a list of file paths to restore from the cache
primaryKey: an explicit key for restoring the cache
restoreKeys: an optional ordered list of keys to use for restoring the cache if no cache hit occurred for key
downloadOptions: cache download options
declarations.title: RestoreCacheArgs

declarations.comments:
paths: a list of file paths to be cached
key: an explicit key for restoring the cache
options: cache upload options
declarations.title: SaveCacheArgs

declarations.comments:
uploadConcurrency: Number of parallel cache upload
uploadConcurrency default: 4
uploadChunkSize: Maximum chunk size in bytes for cache upload
uploadChunkSize default: 32MB
declarations.title: UploadOptions

declarations.comments: A default set of Upload Options. Override as needed
declarations.title: defaultUploadOptions

declarations.comments:
Restores a cache based on primaryKey and restoreKeys to the paths provided. Function returns the cache key for cache hit.
See https://github.com/actions/toolkit/tree/main/packages/cache#save-cache
declarations.title: restoreCache

declarations.comments:
Restores a cache based on primaryKey to the paths provided. Function returns the cache key for cache hit.
https://github.com/actions/toolkit/tree/main/packages/cache#restore-cache
declarations.title: restoreCache'

declarations.comments:
Saves a cache containing the files in paths using the key provided. The files would be compressed using zstandard compression algorithm if zstd is installed, otherwise gzip is used. Function returns the cache id if the cache was saved succesfully and throws an error if cache upload fails.
See https://github.com/actions/toolkit/tree/main/packages/cache#save-cache
declarations.title: saveCache

declarations.comments:
Saves a cache containing the files in paths using the key provided. The files would be compressed using zstandard compression algorithm if zstd is installed, otherwise gzip is used. Function returns the cache id if the cache was saved succesfully and throws an error if cache upload fails.
See https://github.com/actions/toolkit/tree/main/packages/cache#save-cache
declarations.title: saveCache'

modules.name: GitHub.Actions.Core
modules.comments:
Exports functions from the @actions/core module provided by GitHub
https://github.com/actions/toolkit/tree/main/packages/core

declarations.comments:
Interface for getInput options
required: Whether the input is required. If required and not present, will throw
required default: false
declarations.title: InputOptions

declarations.comments:
Sets env variable for this action and future actions in the job
name: the name of the variable to set
val: the value of the variable
declarations.title: exportVariable

declarations.comments: Registers a secret which will get masked from logs
declarations.title: setSecret

declarations.comments: Prepends input path to the PATH (for this action and future actions)
declarations.title: addPath

declarations.comments:
Gets the value of an input.  The value is also trimmed.
name: the name of the input to get
options: See InputOptions
declarations.title: getInput

declarations.comments:
Gets the value of an input.  The value is also trimmed.
Uses default for options
declarations.title: getInput'

declarations.comments: Sets the value of an output.
declarations.title: setOutput

declarations.comments: Enables or disables the echoing of commands into stdout for the rest of the step.
declarations.title: setCommandEcho

declarations.comments:
Sets the action status to failed.
When the action exits it will be with an exit code of 1
declarations.title: setFailed

declarations.comments: Gets whether Actions Step Debug is on or not
declarations.title: isDebug

declarations.comments: Writes debug message to user log
declarations.title: debug

declarations.comments: Adds an error issue
declarations.title: error

declarations.comments: Adds a warning issue
declarations.title: warning

declarations.comments: Writes info to log with console.log.
declarations.title: info

declarations.comments:
Begin an output group.
Output until the next `groupEnd` will be foldable in this group
declarations.title: startGroup

declarations.comments: End an output group.
declarations.title: endGroup

declarations.comments:
Saves state for current action.
The state can only be retrieved by this action's post job execution.
declarations.title: saveState

declarations.comments: Gets the value of an state set by this action's main execution.
declarations.title: getState

declarations.comments: Wrap an asynchronous function call in a group.
declarations.title: group

modules.name: GitHub.Actions.Exec
modules.comments:
Exports functions from the @actions/exec module provided by GitHub
https://github.com/actions/toolkit/tree/main/packages/exec

declarations.comments:
Executes a command on the command line, with arguments
Output will be streamed to the live console. Provides return code
declarations.title: exec

declarations.comments: Executes a command on the command line. Uses defaults for args and options
declarations.title: exec'

declarations.comments:
commandLine: command to execute (can include additional args). Must be correctly escaped.
args: optional arguments for tool. Escaping is handled by the lib. Defaults to empty array.
options: optional exec options.  See ExecOptions
declarations.title: ExecArgs

declarations.comments:
cwd: working directory.  defaults to current
env: envvar dictionary.  defaults to current process's env
silent: defaults to false
outStream: Defaults to process.stdout
errStream: Defaults to process.stderr
windowsVerbatimArguments: whether to skip quoting/escaping arguments if needed.  defaults to false
failOnStdErr: whether to fail if output to stderr.  defaults to false
ignoreReturnCode: defaults to failing on non zero.  ignore will not fail leaving it up to the caller
delay: How long in ms to wait for STDIO streams to close after the exit event of the process before terminating. defaults to 10000
input: input to write to the process on STDIN
listeners: Listeners for output. Callback functions that will be called on these events
declarations.title: ExecOptions

declarations.comments: Defaults for ExecOptions. Override as needed.
declarations.title: defaultExecOptions

declarations.comments: Listeners for output. Callback functions that will be called on these events
declarations.title: ExecListeners

declarations.comments: Defaults for ExecListeners. Override as needed.
declarations.title: defaultExecListeners

modules.name: GitHub.Actions.IO
modules.comments:
Exports functions from the @actions/io module provided by GitHub
https://github.com/actions/toolkit/tree/main/packages/io

declarations.comments:
Whether to recursively copy all subdirectories. Defaults to false
Whether to overwrite existing files in the destination. Defaults to true
declarations.title: CopyOptions

declarations.comments: Defaults for CopyOptions. Override as needed.
declarations.title: defaultCopyOptions

declarations.comments: Whether to overwrite existing files in the destination. Defaults to true
declarations.title: MoveOptions

declarations.comments: Defaults for MoveOptions. Override as needed.
declarations.title: defaultMoveOptions

declarations.comments: Moves a path
declarations.title: mv

declarations.comments: Moves a path
declarations.title: mv'

declarations.comments:
source: source path
dest: destination path
options: See MoveOptions
declarations.title: MvArgs

declarations.comments: Copies a file or folder
declarations.title: cp

declarations.comments: Copies a file or folder
declarations.title: cp'

declarations.comments:
source: source path
dest: destination path
options: See CopyOptions
declarations.title: CpArgs

declarations.comments: Make a directory.  Creates the full path with folders in between. Will throw if it fails
declarations.title: mkdirP

declarations.comments: fsPath: path to create
declarations.title: MkdirPArgs

declarations.comments: Returns path of a tool had the tool actually been invoked.  Resolves via paths. If you check and the tool does not exist, it will throw.
declarations.title: which

declarations.comments:
tool: name of the tool
check: whether to check if tool exists. Defaults to false
declarations.title: WhichArgs

declarations.comments: Remove a path recursively with force
declarations.title: rmRF

declarations.comments: inputPath: path to remove
declarations.title: RmRFArgs

modules.name: GitHub.Actions.ToolCache
modules.comments:
Exports functions from the @actions/tool-cache module provided by GitHub
https://github.com/actions/toolkit/tree/main/packages/tool-cache

declarations.comments: Download a tool from an url and stream it into a file
declarations.title: downloadTool

declarations.comments: Download a tool from an url and stream it into a file
declarations.title: downloadTool'

declarations.comments:
url: url of tool to download
dest: path to download tool. Defaults to randomly generated path
auth: authorization header
declarations.title: DownloadToolArgs

declarations.comments: Extract a .7z file. Returns path to the destination directory
declarations.title: extract7z

declarations.comments: Extract a .7z file. Returns path to the destination directory
declarations.title: extract7z'

declarations.comments:
file: path to the .7z file
dest: destination directory. Optional.
_7zPath: path to 7zr.exe. Optional, for long path support.
declarations.title: Extract7zArgs

declarations.comments: Extract a compressed tar archive. Returns path to the destination directory
declarations.title: extractTar

declarations.comments: Extract a compressed tar archive. Returns path to the destination directory
declarations.title: extractTar'

declarations.comments:
file: path to the tar
dest: destination directory. Defaults to randomly generated path
flags: flags for the tar command to use for extraction. Defaults to 'xz' (extracting gzipped tars).
declarations.title: ExtractTarArgs

declarations.comments: Extract a xar compatible archive. Returns path to the destination directory
declarations.title: extractXar

declarations.comments: Extract a xar compatible archive. Returns path to the destination directory
declarations.title: extractXar'

declarations.comments:
file: path to the archive
dest: destination directory. Defaults to randomly generated path
flags: flags for the xar
declarations.title: ExtractXarArgs

declarations.comments: Extract a zip. Returns path to the destination directory
declarations.title: extractZip

declarations.comments: Extract a zip. Returns path to the destination directory
declarations.title: extractZip'

declarations.comments:
file: path to the zip
dest: destination directory. Defaults to randomly generated path
declarations.title: ExtractZipArgs

declarations.comments: Caches a directory and installs it into the tool cacheDir
declarations.title: cacheDir

declarations.comments: Caches a directory and installs it into the tool cacheDir
declarations.title: cacheDir'

declarations.comments:
sourceDir: the directory to cache into tools
tool: tool name
version: version of the tool.  semver format
architecture of the tool. Defaults to machine architecture
declarations.title: CacheDirArgs

declarations.comments: Caches a downloaded file (GUID) and installs it into the tool cache with a given targetName
declarations.title: cacheFile

declarations.comments: Caches a downloaded file (GUID) and installs it into the tool cache with a given targetName
declarations.title: cacheFile'

declarations.comments:
sourceFile: the file to cache into tools.  Typically a result of downloadTool which is a guid
targetFile: the name of the file name in the tools directory
tool: tool name
version: version of the tool.  semver format
arch: architecture of the tool. Defaults to machine architecture
declarations.title: CacheFileArgs

declarations.comments: Finds the path to a tool version in the local installed tool cache
declarations.title: find

declarations.comments: Finds the path to a tool version in the local installed tool cache
declarations.title: find'

declarations.comments:
toolName: name of the tool
version: version of the tool.
arch: architecture of the tool. Defaults to machine architecture
declarations.title: FindArgs

declarations.comments: Finds the paths to all versions of a tool that are installed in the local tool cache
declarations.title: findAllVersions

declarations.comments: Finds the paths to all versions of a tool that are installed in the local tool cache
declarations.title: findAllVersions'

declarations.comments:
toolName: name of the tool
arch: architecture of the tool. Defaults to machine architecture
declarations.title: FindAllVersionsArgs

declarations.comments: Get list of releases from a repository
declarations.title: getManifestFromRepo

declarations.comments: Get list of releases from a repository
declarations.title: getManifestFromRepo'

declarations.comments:
owner: repository owner
repo: repository name
auth: auth token
branch: branch of the repository. Defaults to 'master'
declarations.title: GetManifestFromRepoArgs

declarations.comments: Search list of releases from a repository
declarations.title: findFromManifest

declarations.comments:
versionSpec: version to search for
stable: whether or not the release is stable
manifest: manifests to search
archFilter: architecture filter. Defaults to machine architecture
declarations.title: FindFromManifestArgs

declarations.comments: Details for a release
declarations.title: IToolRelease

declarations.comments: Details for a release file
declarations.title: IToolReleaseFile
